subject: Elections
History
lead_paragraph: COOPERSTOWN, N.Y., July 28 (AP) — The Baseball Hall of Fame’s directors voted Saturday to cut the size of the veterans committee and the number of players it will consider for future enshrinement.
snippet: COOPERSTOWN, N.Y., July 28 (AP) — The Baseball Hall of Fame’s directors voted Saturday to cut the size of the veterans committee and the number of players it will consider for future enshrinement.
